document_data.name: Ulara Axehaft
document_data.mainbody:
Battle Chaplain '''Ulara Axehaft''' was a priestess of [[Tempus]] who lived in [[Scardale Town]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].

Ulara founded the [[Shrine of Crossed Swords]] in [[1362 DR]] to cater to the foreign garrisons that occupied the city following the [[second inter-dale war]]. Due to the militaristic temperament of the city's newfound occupants, the shrine flourished in the years following its establishment.
